Plot accelerometer data for each day

Source: R/plot_data.R
plot_data.Rd

This function plots accelerometer data against time for each day of measurement, with the possibility to specify the metric to visualize.

plot_data(
  data,
  metric = "axis1",
  col_time = "time",
  col_nonwear = "non_wearing_count",
  col_date = "date"
)

Arguments

data

A dataframe obtained using the prepare_dataset and mark_wear_time functions.
metric

A character value to indicate the name of the variable to be plotted against time.
col_time

A character value to indicate the name of the variable to plot time data.
col_nonwear

A character value to indicate the name of the variable used to count nonwear time.
col_date

A character value to indicate the name of the variable to plot date data.

Value

A ggplot object.

Examples

file <- system.file("extdata", "acc.agd", package = "activAnalyzer")
mydata <- prepare_dataset(data = file, epoch_len_out = 60, col_time_stamp = "timestamp")
mydata_with_wear_marks <- mark_wear_time(dataset = mydata, TS = "timestamp", 
    cts  = "vm", frame = 90, allowanceFrame = 2)

#> frame is 90
#> streamFrame is 30
#> allowanceFrame is 2
plot_data(data = mydata_with_wear_marks, metric = "steps", col_time = "time", 
    col_nonwear = "non_wearing_count", col_date = "date")
